trans-unit.source: Getting started with .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 入门

trans-unit.source: Find resources to learn how to build .NET Core applications on Windows, Linux and macOS.
trans-unit.target: 查找相关资源，了解如何在 Windows、Linux 和 macOS 上生成 .NET Core 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Getting started with .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 入门

trans-unit.source: .NET Core runs on [Windows](#windows), [Linux](#linux), and [macOS / OS X](#os-x--macos).
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 可以在 [Windows](#windows)、[Linux](#linux) 和 [macOS/OS X](#os-x--macos) 上运行。

trans-unit.source: Windows
trans-unit.target: Windows

trans-unit.source: Install .NET Core on [Windows](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#windows).
trans-unit.target: 在 [Windows](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#windows) 上安装 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: You can get started developing .NET Core apps by following these step-by-step tutorials.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过以下分步教程着手开发 .NET Core 应用。

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core on Windows, using Visual Studio 2015](tutorials/using-on-windows.md) - Learn how to use [Visual Studio](https://www.visualstudio.com/), the full-featured integrated development environment (IDE) for Windows, for different .NET Core scenarios.
trans-unit.target: [使用 Visual Studio 2015 在 Windows 上开始 .NET Core](tutorials/using-on-windows.md) - 了解如何针对不同的 .NET Core 应用场景使用适用于 Windows 的全功能集成开发环境 (IDE) [Visual Studio](https://www.visualstudio.com/)。

trans-unit.source: [Get started with Visual Studio Code using C# and .NET Core on Windows](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/dotnet/Get-started-with-VS-Code-using-CSharp-and-NET-Core) - This Channel9 video shows you how to install and use [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs), Microsoft's lightweight cross-platform code editor, to create your first console application in .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: [使用 C# 和 .NET Core 在 Windows 上开始 Visual Studio Code](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/dotnet/Get-started-with-VS-Code-using-CSharp-and-NET-Core) - 本第 9 频道视频演示了如何安装并使用 Microsoft 轻量级跨平台代码编辑器 [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs) 在 .NET Core 中创建第一个控制台应用程序。

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core on macOS, using Visual Studio Code](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) - This tutorial is mainly written for macOS, but you can follow the steps on Windows for a tour of the steps and workflow to create a .NET Core Solution using VS Code.
trans-unit.target: [使用 Visual Studio Code 在 macOS 上开始 .NET Core](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) - 本教程主要为 macOS 编写，但可按照在 Windows 上进行相关操作的步骤，了解使用 VS Code 创建 .NET Core 解决方案的步骤和工作流。

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command-line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - Use any code editor with the [.NET Core cross-platform command-line interface (CLI)](tools/index.md).
trans-unit.target: [使用命令行开始 .NET Core](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - 可以结合使用任何代码编辑器和 [.NET Core 跨平台命令行接口 (CLI)](tools/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: See the [Prerequisites for Windows development](windows-prerequisites.md) topic for a list of the supported Windows versions.
trans-unit.target: 有关受支持的 Windows 版本列表，请参阅 [Windows 开发的先决条件](windows-prerequisites.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: Linux
trans-unit.target: Linux

trans-unit.source: Install .NET Core on your distribution/version:
trans-unit.target: 在发行版/版本上安装 .NET Core：

trans-unit.source: [Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Server](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#redhat)
trans-unit.target: [Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Server](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#redhat)

trans-unit.source: [Ubuntu 14.04, 16.04 & Linux Mint 17](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#ubuntu)
trans-unit.target: [Ubuntu 14.04、16.04 和 Linux Mint 17](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#ubuntu)

trans-unit.source: [Debian 8.2](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#debian)
trans-unit.target: [Debian 8.2](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#debian)

trans-unit.source: [Fedora 23](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#fedora)
trans-unit.target: [Fedora 23](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#fedora)

trans-unit.source: [CentOS 7.1 & Oracle Linux 7.1](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#centos)
trans-unit.target: [CentOS 7.1 和 Oracle Linux 7.1](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#centos)

trans-unit.source: [openSUSE 13.2](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#opensuse)
trans-unit.target: [openSUSE 13.2](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#opensuse)

trans-unit.source: You can get started developing .NET Core apps by following these step-by-step tutorials.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过以下分步教程着手开发 .NET Core 应用。

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command-line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - Use any code editor with the [.NET Core cross-platform command-line interface (CLI)](tools/index.md).
trans-unit.target: [使用命令行开始 .NET Core](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - 可以结合使用任何代码编辑器和 [.NET Core 跨平台命令行接口 (CLI)](tools/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: [Get started with VS Code using C# and .NET Core on Ubuntu](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/dotnet/Get-started-with-VS-Code-Csharp-dotnet-Core-Ubuntu) - This Channel9 video shows you how to install and use [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs), Microsoft's lightweight cross-platform code editor, to create your first console application in .NET Core on Ubuntu 14.04.
trans-unit.target: [使用 C# 和 .NET Core 在 Ubuntu 上开始 VS Code](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/dotnet/Get-started-with-VS-Code-Csharp-dotnet-Core-Ubuntu) - 本第 9 频道视频演示了如何安装并使用 Microsoft 轻量级跨平台代码编辑器 [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs) 在 Ubuntu 14.04 的 .NET Core 中创建第一个控制台应用程序。

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core on macOS, using Visual Studio Code](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) - This tutorial is mainly written for macOS, but you can follow the steps on Linux for a tour of the steps and workflow to create a .NET Core Solution using VS Code.
trans-unit.target: [使用 Visual Studio Code 在 macOS 上开始 .NET Core](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) - 本教程主要为 macOS 编写，但可按照在 Linux 上进行相关操作的步骤，了解使用 VS Code 创建 .NET Core 解决方案的步骤和工作流。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is supported by the Linux distributions and versions listed above in the installation links.
trans-unit.target: 上述安装链接列出的 Linux 发行版和版本均支持 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: OS X / macOS
trans-unit.target: OS X/macOS

trans-unit.source: Install .NET Core for [macOS](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#macos).
trans-unit.target: 安装适用于 [macOS](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#macos) 的 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is supported on OS X El Capitan (version 10.11) and macOS Sierra (version 10.12).
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 可在 OS X El Capitan（版本 10.11）和 macOS Sierra（版本 10.12）上使用。

trans-unit.source: You can get started developing .NET Core apps by following these step-by-step tutorials.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过以下分步教程着手开发 .NET Core 应用。

trans-unit.source: [Get started with VS Code using C# and .NET Core on macOS](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/dotnet/Get-started-with-VS-Code-using-CSharp-and-NET-Core-on-MacOS) - This Channel9 video shows you how to install and use [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs), Microsoft's lightweight cross-platform code editor, to create your first console application in .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: [使用 C# 和 .NET Core 在 macOS 上开始 VS Code](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/dotnet/Get-started-with-VS-Code-using-CSharp-and-NET-Core-on-MacOS) - 本第 9 频道视频演示了如何安装并使用 Microsoft 轻量级跨平台代码编辑器 [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs) 在 .NET Core 中创建第一个控制台应用程序。

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core on macOS, using Visual Studio Code](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) - A tour of the steps and workflow to create a .NET Core Solution using VS Code that includes unit tests, third-party libraries and how to use the debugging tools.
trans-unit.target: [使用 Visual Studio Code 在 macOS 上开始 .NET Core](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) - 了解使用 VS Code 创建 .NET Core 解决方案的步骤和工作流，包括单元测试、第三方库和如何使用调试工具。

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command-line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - Use any code editor with the [.NET Core cross-platform command-line interface (CLI)](tools/index.md).
trans-unit.target: [使用命令行开始 .NET Core](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - 可以结合使用任何代码编辑器和 [.NET Core 跨平台命令行接口 (CLI)](tools/index.md)。
